MENU.FILE:
&File File Operations
Regenerate decals.bin in all spaces Save selected effect Import Terrain Ambient Occlusion Map... Export Terrain Ambient Occlusion Map... Import Terrain Normal Map... Export Terrain Normal Map... Clone selection Export selection to COLLADA... Export all trees BSPs to COLLADA... Import all trees BSPs from COLLADA... Save Content Checkers as Prefab... Synchronize WWise Sound Max Distance Generate diffuse texture for SpeedTree (*.srt) Show Clouds Shadow Panel Show Decals Panel Show Detour Navigation Show Dirt Preset Manager Show Flora Panel Show Flora Panel Show HDR Lighting Panel Show Lens Flare Panel Show Memory Panel Show Old To PBS Panel Show Overlay Material Panel Show Presets Panel Show Statistics Panel Show Watchers Panel Pause sound events to reload Restore sound events after reload
&New Space... Create a new space
&Open Space... Open a space
Edit Space.. Edit Space
Save Space As... Save a new copy of this space
Reload All Chun&ks Reload all chunks
&Reload All Textures Reload all textures
&Reload Flora Reload flora
Regenerate Terrain LODs Regenerate Terrain LODs
Regenerate Thumbnails Regenerate thumbnails for all chunks in the space
Regenerate Navigation Regenerate navigation data for all chunks in the space
Invalidate All Chunks Invalidate all chunks in the space
Create Space Image... Create images of current space
Resize Space... Expand or reduce chunk size of the space
&Save Save all changed data
&Process Data Process all data
Recalc C&urrent Chunk Recalculate all derived data for the current chunk
Resize Terrain Texture &Blends... Resize Terrain Texture Blends
&Recent Spaces
E&xit
MENU.EDIT:
&Edit Edit Operations
&Undo undo the last change
&Redo redo the last undone change
&Clear Undo/Redo History clear undo/redo history
&Select All select all items
&Deselect All deselect all items
Save Shell as &Template
Save Selection as Prefa&b...
&Hide Selection
Unh&ide Selection

U&nhide All
&Freeze Selection
Unfr&eeze Selection
Unfreeze All Selectable
Unfree&ze All

en.MAINTOOLBAR:
Main Toolbar &View Ortho Toggle Orthographic View &Player Preview Mode Player Preview Mode .
Camera Speed &Slow Motion &Medium Motion &Fast Motion &Super Fast
Chunk Vizualization Mode Normal Mode Chunk Borders Pole Markers Wireframe Mode
&Edit in External Editors Edit the file in external editor &Draw terrain as wireframe Draw terrain as wireframe &Hide All Outside Objects Hide All Outside Objects &Show Zones Show zones texture Show Navigation Mesh(&H) Show Navigation Mesh

SCENEBROWSERTOOLBAR.AUTOZOOM: Zooms to the selected asset as soon as it's selected
SCENEBROWSERTOOLBAR.SHOWONLYLOCKEDITEMS: Show items in chunks locked by me
